mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Todo(title, memo, star, userId) VALUES(#{title}, #{memo}, #{star}, #{userId});
mapper.update: UPDATE todo SET title=#{title}, memo=#{memo}, completed=#{completed} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT distinct DATE(written_date) as written_date FROM todo WHERE userId=#{userId} ORDER BY DATE(written_date) ASC
SELECT * FROM todo WHERE written_date LIKE CONCAT(#{date}, '%') and userId=#{userId}
SELECT id FROM User WHERE loginId=#{loginId}
SELECT count(completed) as completed FROM todo WHERE completed = 1
SELECT count(completed) as completed FROM todo WHERE completed = 0
